mapper.select: select a.*,b.customer_name,c.num as contract_num,c.money as contract_money,d.realname as owner_user_name from wk_crm_invoice as a left join wk_crm_customer as b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id left join wk_crm_contract as c on a.contract_id = c.contract_id left join wk_admin_user as d on a.owner_user_id = d.user_id where ${sql} order by a.update_time desc

select a.*,b.customer_name,c.num as contract_num,c.money as contract_money,d.realname as owner_user_name,e.realname as create_user_name from wk_crm_invoice as a left join wk_crm_customer as b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id left join wk_crm_contract as c on a.contract_id = c.contract_id left join wk_admin_user as d on a.owner_user_id = d.user_id left join wk_admin_user as e on a.create_user_id = e.user_id where invoice_id = #{id}
